result.reason: The issue proposes a broad dynamic-folder concept but does not provide concrete, testable requirements or validated behavior on current builds.
result.approach: Request retest on v1.79.x/upstream dev plus clear use cases, data sources (SQL/AD/service discovery), refresh rules, and acceptance criteria before scoping implementation.
